p: The flavonoid metabolites of four Chaenomeles petals were analyzed by an UPLC-ESI-MS/MS system, which including UPLC (ultra performance liquid chromatography, Shim-pack UFLC SHIMADZU CBM30A system, www.shimadzu.com.cn/) and MS/MS (tandem mass spectrometry, Applied Biosystems 4500 Q TRAP, www.appliedbiosystems.com.cn/).
